label: 源為義
本: Five Mountains: The Rinzai Zen Monastic Institution in Medieval Japan . Harvard University Press . 1981
見出し読み: みなもと の ためよし
説明文: (1096-1156) The head of the Seiwa Genji, who made his career as a respected military noble in the capital area. He served as Imperial Police Captain and was an important retainer of the sekkanke. He sided with the losing side in the Hogen Disturbance (1156), after which he was decapitated.
